name: Blue: Store
description:
You come into a store that sells haunted and cursed things. You can go around the store and look at things without buying them, or maybe talk to the storekeeper.

   The game is made for the 32-bit Spring Cleaning Jam!    

Thank you for the chance! 

Making the game for the jam is very fun, as I bring my stuff to school to do it. 

There are multiple endings, have fun!

If the font looks weird, try install the font in the game folder.

Note: If you're stuck in some parts, read the "r e a d   m e.txt" file, your problems might be solved.

Thank you very much for checking this out! Have a nice day
